definition[0]: a delay before something bad happens or continues to happen
example[0]: Shoppers will get a temporary reprieve from the new sales tax.
definition[1]: an official order stopping the killing of a prisoner as a punishment
example[1]: The US Supreme Court voted against granting Smith a reprieve  (=against giving him one).
definition[2]: to officially stop a prisoner from being killed as a punishment
definition[3]: to change a decision to close a factory, school etc or get rid of something
